project_abstract.cdata: The Waigaoqiao Thermal Power Project is intended to: 1) increase electricity supply to reduce the acute power shortages in Shanghai through development of two very large coal-fired super-critical thermal units; 2) develop a program to apply for the first time in China the "bubble concept" for cost effective air quality management within Shanghai Municipality; 3) support the ongoing power sector reform by restructuring Shanghai Municipal Electric Power Company (SMEPC) in line with the power sector reform strategy; increasing private sector involvement through listing of the generation company; and adjusting the tariff level to accommodate the stricter sulfur dioxide emission standards; and 4) promote an innovative and diversified financing model for large infrastructure projects and improve the access of power entities to international financial markets.  The project will include the following components: (i) investment; (ii) environmental protection; (iii) power sector reform; and (iv) institutional development.

P044485.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>外高桥火电项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在：（1）通过建设两台特大型超临界燃煤发电机组增加电力供应，缓解上海市电力紧缺状况；（2）制定一项方案，以便在中国首次应用“污染泡沫概念”，以较低成本对上海市控制质量进行管理；（3）支持正在进行的电力行业改革，为此将采取以下措施：根据电力行业改革战略要求，对上海市电力公司进行重组；通过公司上市提升私营部门参与度；调整电价水平，以便达到更严格的二氧化硫排放标准；（4）推广针对大型基础设施项目的创新型和多样化融资模式，促进电力实体进入国际金融市场。本项目设有以下几个子项目：（1）投资子项目；（2）环境保护子项目；（3）电力行业改革子项目；（4）制度建设子项目。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
